summary: An unscrupulous agent for the Borgias suffers a change of heart when asked to betray a noble count and his much younger, very beautiful wife.
cast: Tyrone Power|Orson Welles|Wanda Hendrix|Marina Berti|Everett Sloane|Katina Paxinou|Felix Aylmer|Adriano Ambrogi|Alan Asherman|Leslie Bradley|Eva Brauer|James Carney|Eduardo Ciannelli|Franco Corsaro|Eugene Deckers|Ludmilla Dudarova|Giuseppe Faeti|Kenneth Lang|Albert Latasha|Rena Lenart|Antonella Lualdi|Njntsky|Alex Serberoli|Erminio Spalla|Clinton Sundeen|Michael Tor|Bernardo Valentini|Joop van Hulzen|Ves Vanghielova|Igor Volodimerow|Ariadne Welter
